channel.title: Lost Santos - VPS hosted - Official thread
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://i57.tinypic.com/4v011w.jpg[/img]
[URL=https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/45449662/Lost%20Santos.jar][b]Download client[/b][/URL] [URL=http://exilumps.com][b]Website[/b][/URL]
[b]Our Economy[/b]
After giving it alot of thought, people don't like that hard of an economy. The economy of Lost Santos will be very stable, and will involve alot of skilling/trading. Here is the basic format of what it is going to be.
You can buy base supplies from a shop (seeds for example). With those base supplies, you will have to make the herbs, which will then make the potions. This way, you just can't buy potions, which there is no sense of accomplishment in. You still can buy potions but not Super, you have to make everything ownself (: You only have supplies for it. [/MOD]
[b]Our Skilling[/b] In Lost Santos, we will have something called universal skilling. Which basically means, instead of having a zone designed specifically for skilling, we will make it so you can skill anywhere on Lost Santos. That means you can roam to anywhere across Lost Santos, and chop down trees/ mine some rocks depending on the locations in RS.
What this allows a player to do, is get a good feel of real skilling rathe than easy, 5 minute skilling. This will add a level of difficulty when getting those 99's also!
[b]Minigaming[/b]
100% working barrows minigame 100% working pest control 100% working duel arena, without bugs 100% working tzhaar cave
[b]Bossing[/b]
Godwars dungeon Corporeal beast Dagganoth cavern Tormented demons Nex for donators
[b]Skilling[/b]
Melee
- Completely Re-Done Combat System - All special attacks working completely and accuratly - PvP | PvM | NvN system rewrites
Magic
- Modern/Ancient/Lunar Spellbooks Added - Lunar Spells/Modern Spells only have ones that work well with the server - Re-done combat system - All ancient spells work
Ranging
- Re-done combat system - Bolt effects / Effect System - Bows/Arrows Working correctly
Prayer
- Bones on Altar - Bury Bones
Mining
- Rocks lose the ore after mining it - Prospecting - All rocks included
Smithing
- Smelting Correctly Implemented - Bronze-Rune Armour smithing
Fishing
- Net / Bait / Lure / Cage / Harpoon / Big Net (Sea Turtles and Rocktails) - Correct secondary item for fishing when needed
Cooking
- Ability to cook all food that one can fish - Burning Formula that relates to the cooking level
Firemaking
- Clipping to the walls - All logs can be burned - Customized Inferno Adze Quest
Woodcutting
- All trees can be cut down - Formula for trees - all hatchets working with effect in forumla
Agility
- Gnome Course - Barbarian Course
Herblore
- All regular potions done - Extremes Makeable - 1 5 10 X All working - Overloads w/Effect
Thieving
- Pick pocketing with failing - Stalls thievable - Not the main source of money in a server
Farming
- All Herb Seeds / Watering / Raking
Crafting
- Tanning - Leather / Hard Leather - All Dragonhide
Slayer
- Slayer Tasks/ Shop - Much better system, (70-150 per task) - Slayer Tower
Runecrafting
- All altars - Tiara activating - Multiple Runes
Hunter
- Butterfly's - Imps (Not much to hunter)
Dungeoneering
- 5 Floors - 4 Complexities for Each Floor - All dungeoneering items/Armour bindable - A Boss per Floor (With Special (Custom)) - 120 Dungeoneering Max Level, with Formula - Formula for dungeoneerng XP - Tokens received is 10 times less than xp received. - Working Tab Interface - Leave/Abandon Working on Logout/DC/On Command - Shop rewards in tokens are nothing more than regular shop rewards (no primal OP stuff)
[b]Media[/b]
[IMG]http://i61.tinypic.com/23wnqyb.png[/img] [IMG]http://i59.tinypic.com/t9cb9w.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i59.tinypic.com/3343iq0.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/11kff4y.png[/img] [IMG]http://i61.tinypic.com/72yja1.png[/img] [IMG]http://i58.tinypic.com/2u587zb.png[/img]

item.title: Lost Santos - VPS hosted - Official thread
item.dc:creator: @whattehp406 whattehp406
item.description:
@whattehp406 wrote:

[quote=“Ykcud, post:10, topic:544907”]This server has the most bizarre rules I have ever come across:

  • No spamming, auto typers must be at 10 seconds at the least.

  • On yell auto typers must be at 30 seconds at the least

  • No using poisoned arrows

  • No selling reckless items for non reckless items.

  • No multivoting

  • No using safe spots inside the wilderness

  • No selling recklesspk items for anything except other recklesspk items.

  • No using multiple spellbooks, ex. TB + Barrage

  • No scamming with spawnable items, ex. Christmas Crackers or Boxed Third-Age sets

  • No spamming at ::yell

  • No autoclicking or timing allowed in duel arena

I would advice you to change these rules but . . . they are kind of funny in the same way the room is funny. I mean, what!?[/quote]The thing about these rules is that they can all be programmed to not even be possible. OP lazy or leecher?

Read full topic
item.source: Lost Santos - VPS hosted - Official thread

item.title: Lost Santos - VPS hosted - Official thread
item.dc:creator: @Ykcud Ykcud
item.description:
@Ykcud wrote:

This server has the most bizarre rules I have ever come across:

  • No spamming, auto typers must be at 10 seconds at the least.

  • On yell auto typers must be at 30 seconds at the least

  • No using poisoned arrows

  • No selling reckless items for non reckless items.

  • No multivoting

  • No using safe spots inside the wilderness

  • No selling recklesspk items for anything except other recklesspk items.

  • No using multiple spellbooks, ex. TB + Barrage

  • No scamming with spawnable items, ex. Christmas Crackers or Boxed Third-Age sets

  • No spamming at ::yell

  • No autoclicking or timing allowed in duel arena

I would advice you to change these rules but . . . they are kind of funny in the same way the room is funny. I mean, what!?

Read full topic

[CENTER]

[URL=https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/45449662/Lost%20Santos.jar]Download client[/URL]
[URL=http://exilumps.com]Website[/URL]

Our Economy

After giving it alot of thought, people don’t like that hard of an economy. The economy of Lost Santos will be very stable, and will involve alot of skilling/trading. Here is the basic format of what it is going to be.

You can buy base supplies from a shop (seeds for example). With those base supplies, you will have to make the herbs, which will then make the potions. This way, you just can’t buy potions, which there is no sense of accomplishment in. You still can buy potions but not Super, you have to make everything ownself (: You only have supplies for it. [/MOD]

In Lost Santos, we will have something called universal skilling. Which basically means, instead of having a zone designed specifically for skilling, we will make it so you can skill anywhere on Lost Santos. That means you can roam to anywhere across Lost Santos, and chop down trees/ mine some rocks depending on the locations in RS.

What this allows a player to do, is get a good feel of real skilling rathe than easy, 5 minute skilling. This will add a level of difficulty when getting those 99’s also!
